content.content: We just created a proposal for a time-based switch EIP. Please check it out, we would love to hear your thoughts on it - https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3290/files
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post has created a proposal for a time-based switch EIP and is asking for feedback. They provide a link to the proposal and express their interest in hearing thoughts on it. Some 3rd parties may be interested in giving constructive criticism or asking questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal
